website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a beautiful and sturdy fireplace TV stand, although you may want to brew a large pot of coffee for the assembly.
pros: High praise for its looks and price
cons: Assembly can be a bit of a challenge due to improperly aligned holes and the fact that it can take several hours to complete
Some buyers report issues with the heater dying within a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: No thermostat otherwise nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I misrepresented didn’t read thoroughly, but this is not a good option for a fireplace. It looks very nice and heats very quickly. There is no remote or thermostat so it just keeps heating. It heats up rather quickly and is very quiet as well. The lack of thermostat or any type of dial to adjust the temp makes this useless for our intended purpose, which was our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ann

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous clicking noise
customer_reviews.text: Was reasonably easy to assemble, an electric screwdriver goes along way. There was only one hole slightly out of alignment. Looks good The problem? The faux fire place makes a horrendous clicking noise when running. Heater works fine, just the lights. Not sure if something is messed up in the drum or what. Will be contacting customer service. Luckily, it's only 6 screws to remove it. Pretty disappointed actually. Will reassess after speaking to CS.
customer_reviews.author: Songdog83

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a fireplace entertainment center this is the one! It arrived in time and came very well packaged. The pieces are all labeled and the parts bags are labeled as well. I put the whole thing together myself so it can be done by 1 person. The fireplace produces a lot of heat and quickly. I have a 43 inch tv on top and it fits perfectly with a little extra room. I highly recommend this product. It's easily put together, sturdy, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Myer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Weathered Oak Finish Unit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Weathered Oak (which the vendor said is the same as “Natural”). I did not put it together myself but between unboxing and putting the entertainment center up and everything connected - it took nearly 2 hours. We enjoy this fireplace tv stand and really glad to have gone with this type of finish. The shelves are rather spacious as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Heats the whole room
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a fireplace but not the work that goes into it. This is perfect! All the parts were included, no scratches or dings. Went together easily. I have been using this fireplace for 3 months now and virtually no problems. I have an open floor plan and this little guy heats it up just fine. I do use thermal light blocking draperies to cover all my windows in my livingroom and have noticed if they are not drawn it takes much longer to heat the room. Common sense. I recommend this product to everyone. Even if they have a wood burning fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsheylmun

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to assemble. Low price and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I'm recovering from knee surgery and I was able to put the majority of this together by myself. I needed some help with things when it came to getting low to the ground and reaching, like screwing the doors on. Obviously it's not real wood, but pressed wood.. but its heavy and very nice looking. I've wanted one of these for so long and I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality- easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t find a remote in the box. ??? Beautiful unit and super easy to put together. I put this together by myself. Easy to follow instructions and very well marked. I don’t remember when I purchased it but I procrastinated for a good six months thinking it was going to be a beast to put together. I opted to not put on the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele Pospisil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV Stand!!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah! I’m ready for fall with this completely amazing tv stand. It was just me, a screwdriver and my dog’s moral support so this definitely took a little while to put together. It says one hour for 1-2 people but it took me almost FOUR! No biggie..I really enjoy projects like these and it was something active for me to do. The holes and screws all lined up and all the pieces were in great condition. Update: I’ve had this piece for 4 months and I just absolutely adore it! It does help heat up my small living room while looking so sharp. It’s my favorite piece of furniture in my house - hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Deeter

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Fireplace in the House!
customer_reviews.text: I live on the bottom floor of a 2 family home &, of course, could not have a fireplace. Well the tv stand is the perfect alternative! Has a real flame glow & even has a switch to turn the heating element on. Even on a rainy summer night the fireplace adds a warming touch to the room. Love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: linny fahey

customer_reviews.title: pretty good stand
customer_reviews.text: fairly solid stand descent directions. not to hard to assemble descent looking. liked stand because it was reasonably priced and the height was higher than most stands so you could see beter overall it will do the trick
customer_reviews.author: brian klein

customer_reviews.title: Well made easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how there could be any negative reviews on the fireplace. The directions were so easy to follow and I put it together in two hours by myself. It is well made. I definitely recommend this beautiful addition to your home.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son in his new apartment. PERFECT PERFECT PERFECT! He uses it all the time! Even when he wants just fire for atmosphere, can be used without heat on!
customer_reviews.author: MariansGrandmother

customer_reviews.title: Nice mantel with moderate difficulty putting together
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful mantel! I love the color and the fireplace. Although we decided to not put the doors on (due to the screws being off), the mantel actually looks very solid. They messed up on the drilling of the screws which lead to a lot of issues; it wasn’t the worst piece of furniture to put together, but be prepared to spend a few hours doing so. Overall, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Newell Rand

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product looks like it has scratch marks on it, but worst of all the drawers on the side do not align. The wood is warped and the glass doors do not close.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Because I like nick nacks I chose not to put on doors
customer_reviews.text: I have only a small senior apt.This cabinet is perfect. I LOVE the faux fire place it s so calming to watch and fall asleep by. While the TV fits great I hope to put TV on wall to make more room for Holiday Decos !!!!!! Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy. Nice high quality hinges looks great. Fireplace is great and realistic. Cant go wrong here. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst tv stand ever
customer_reviews.text: Product missing slot of part and some part are the wrong size .... I don't recommend this product to anyone It takes too long to assemble it ....they send me the wrong size part
customer_reviews.author: Evan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to put together and after never stayed together. Broke after 2 months. Garbage so called wood.
customer_reviews.author: cmmannon

customer_reviews.title: Heater stopped heating after three months
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first but now almost three months later the fireplace heater stopped working .the light still works but the heat doesn't ..it is great storage space and cute but disappointed the heater couldn't last a long time .
customer_reviews.author: Katie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This came just as expected. The color is what we were expecting and all the parts were there. I love the heater and fireplace. The space heater works fantastically in our living room. We haven't had to turn on the heat since we bought this. Note, we live in the South so it hasn't been that cold, but it's been cold enough to want some heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Love the cabinet color and the fireplace inside the cabinet. I thought it was going to come with remote for fireplace but there was now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: We do like our entertainment/fireplace center
customer_reviews.text: This entertainment center fireplace piece of furniture was what we had expected and we like it. The only thing is that the fireplace did not have a remote and puts out enough heat for our small space, but would not heat a very big area.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Donowho

customer_reviews.title: MDF that doesn’t not line up squarely
customer_reviews.text: The look of the piece finished is nice. However, the boards do not match up and there are points where this is noticeable. This is in a hunting camp so it doesn’t matter as much. Also, screws it called for where not in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love the product and style
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and style. Didn’t realize when I ordered it that it didn’t come with remote control and no heat settings. But overall it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Green

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Its exactly what I wanted. It is heavy and takes a while to put together but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly_girl

customer_reviews.title: It was just like it was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great! Easy assembly.Having heater in center saves space.
customer_reviews.author: Belva

customer_reviews.title: Nice furniture
customer_reviews.text: We needed it for our Fl. room. We have no heat in that room. This fireplace is perfect for us, heat, style and size. The only thing i would recommend is arrows for front back and sides. When putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Received good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed, when three months later the heating unit malfunctioned . But I was very impressed that between Ameriwood and Amazon I was able to get the piece replaced. It was already late spring so I’m hoping that when I turn it on again in the fall It will be working like new.
customer_reviews.author: SEARCHING

customer_reviews.title: Went pretty well except we put the front doors on the ...
customer_reviews.text: We took a couple of days to put it together. Went pretty well except we put the front doors on the wrong side. Easy fix just took time . Looks nice. Gives heat and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Stippich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. This fire place is awesome. It heats up great. It does take a while to put together but it’s worth it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole vactor

customer_reviews.title: No remote control
customer_reviews.text: Once I assembled it was not bad looking. a little smaller than the picture but my wife likes it. I was disappointed no remote control. I would have bought one with remote if I had known before purchasing. Somehow I missed that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Everything was labeled. It took some time but beautiful piece. Very well made. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sivillo

customer_reviews.title: THE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Quality is exceptional & having the company offer a crew to put it together......1 extra star*
customer_reviews.author: Tameki Cole

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I chose the lighter color as everything ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I chose the lighter color as everything in my living room was darker, and it is beautiful. It took my husband about an hour to assemble. Everything works great, so glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but fireplace heat goes out.
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful once you sit it up. The fireplace was letting out good heat for maybe 3 months before it went out.
customer_reviews.author: Cordale Allen

customer_reviews.title: No instructions enclosed
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it. However it didn't come with instructions so I had to search for a pdf to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Buy
customer_reviews.text: takes a minute to assemble much easier and a time saver with a drill. but overall worth the buy it works and looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Raynard

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed, bought for my sister and she loves it. Works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It was just as it was represented to be.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with it. I've been wanting one for quite some time but I had to research it first. I think I made a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture I love how it looks in my place!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah!

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than I expected. Easy to assemble. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Browne

customer_reviews.title: Heat doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Heat part went out after 7 days. Typical china piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is a 1 inch gap at the top of the doors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Chicago Fireplace TV Stand for TVs up to 50", Natural
product_meta.description: Style Name:50" Fireplace| Color:Weathered OakTurn up the ambiance with the Ameriwood Home Chicago electric fireplace TV console. This electric fireplace allows you to enjoy the flame with or without heat, and features a LED light source boasting up to 50, 000 hours of life. The fireplace warms rooms up to 400 square feet and also offers open storage for your cable box, Gaming console or Blu-Ray player. The TV console holds a flat screen TV up to 50” with a maximum weight of 70 lbs. So you can relax in the comfort of your own home while watching your favorite TV shows or movies. It also features easy-access storage behind 2 glass doors to keep your Blu-Ray, books and remotes from the everyday dust. The light brown woodgrain finish is sure to complement your living room, family room or sitting room’s décor with its traditional style and molding details. After fully assembled, this fireplace TV console measures to be 31.77”H x 47.24”W x 15.87”D. This unit is constructed of laminated particleboard and MDF with a metal fireplace insert. Two adults are recommended for proper assembly.
feature_bullets: The Ameriwood Home chicago electric fireplace TV console gives you the perfect combination of storage with an added fireplace bonus
The TV console supports up to a 50” flat panel TV with a maximum weight of 70 lbs. And is constructed of particleboard and MDF in a laminated light brown woodgrain Finish with a center metal Firebox
Top divided open shelf is great for keeping your cable box or Blu-Ray player and the 2 side cabinets have 2 additional shelves behind Glass doors for books and DVDs
This fireplace TV console ships flat to your door and needs to be assembled Upon opening. Top surface holds up to 70 lbs. And the open divided shelf holds 30 lbs.
Clean and Care: Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,009 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly.
